content: I was really sad I didn't get my craft trade and ernie mercer stepped up and
made me this cool cool gore demon and just so neat coming out of this pit take
a look at that we'll take a look at this really cool but let's have roderick step
in here for a second for some scale here and wow yeah Roderick spree scared of
that I would I would be too but wow look at this guy just the gore hanging down
the coloring is just fantastic really really neat and has some felt on the
bottom so it won't scuff any surfaces and really really cool I just want to
thank you again Ernie for the thoughtful a gift you take care and I hope you guys
enjoyed seeing this really cool thing that Ernie created
